entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 03 March 2023
